title: Armando Returns
description: Their secret wedding should have been the happiest event of their lives. Armando Barboza and Katie McCormack were both eighteen years old and fresh out of high school when Katie's father brutally ripped them apart.Ten years later, a simple phone call turns Armando's life upside down and sends him running home to find her.Who will Katie choose? The man whose ring she wears, or the high school sweetheart whose loss shattered her world?
author: Reeni Austin
